titleStmt.title: A relation of the engagement of His Majesties fleet with the enemies, on the 11. of August, 1673. as it has been represented by letters from the several squadrons.

notesStmt.note: Below title on t.p.: "Published by authority."
Imperfect: cropped, faded, and with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
